DOC.brief_summary: Clinical Study Evaluate Efficacy , Dose-response Safety SA09012 Bronchial Asthma Patients
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis presence asthma within 3 month prestudy visit 1 . Increase PEF ≥ 20 % ≥ 60L/min baseline value take Bronchodilator screen within 3 month prestudy visit 2 . Increase FEV1 ≥ 12 % ≥ 200mL baseline value take Bronchodilator screen within 3 month prestudy visit FEV1 PEF 60 % 85 % predict value screen within 3 month prestudy visit Having sign informed consent Patient severe asthma Patient significant medical condition might compromise patient safety , interfere evaluation preclude completion study protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply Patient AST ALT > 2x ULN ( upper limit normal ) screen visit Patient 10 pack year cigarettes history
